text:
[Verse]
City lights are glowing
People keep on going
Dreams are always flowing
In a world so loud

[Verse 2]
Feet are always dancing
Life's a game of chancing
Hearts are ever glancing
In this crowded town

[Chorus]
Chasing shadows in the night
Flickering like candlelight
Holding on to dreams so tight
Chasing shadows till daylight

[Verse 3]
Voices all around me
Faces blend and sound free
Wishing we could just be
In a timeless place

[Chorus]
Chasing shadows in the night
Flickering like candlelight
Holding on to dreams so tight
Chasing shadows till daylight

[Bridge]
Neon signs are buzzing
City never pausing
Find our way while loving
In this endless race
title: Chasing Shadows
